Translations.Text: Say O Moj servants verit ona reverence tvoj Lord those zavodny righteousness v this world dobry reward GOD's zem bol spacious those steadfastly persevere receive ich recompense generously limits
Say ja commanded kult GOD devoting nabozenstvo absolutely Him alone
Say ja fear if ja disobeyed moj Lord retribution velka dni
Say GOD bol iba Jeden ja kult devoting moj nabozenstvo absolutely Him alone
Therefore kult whatever ona zelat Him. Say real losers bol those lose ich souls ich rodina Dni Vzkriesenie. Vela istota this bol real loss
They have masses z zapalit them pod them. GOD thus alerts JEHO servants O MOJ servants ONA reverence MNA
Mat rad for those discard kult all idols devote totally GOD alone they zasluzit happiness. Dat dobry zvest Moj servants
They bol jeden examine all words potom nasledovat the lepsie! These je jeden koho GOD guided these je jeden possess inteligencia
S zretel do those zasluzit retribution have ona save those mozem bol already Hell
Mat rad for those reverence ich Lord they have rezidencia rezidencia zostrojit for them s flowing streams This bol GOD's promise GOD never zlomit Jeho promise

Ona nie see GOD sends nadol sky zavlazit potom miesto it into podzemna draha wells potom produces it zasadit robit z various colors potom they grow until they turn zlty potom He turns them hay This bol reminder those possess inteligencia
